fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Taxation, Transport, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: EU structural support, regulation in field of financial  products and services
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Latvian Leasing association was established on 17 October 2000. The association unites Latvian biggest leasing companies. 
The association ensures leasing companies’ interests, provides regular statistics summaries about Latvian leasing operation indicator, analysing market tendencies both in general and separately as well as taking care of its availability for Latvian society.
